servinfo.title: Accessory Drive Belt and Idler Pulley Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: Disconnect negative (–) cable at battery before removing and installing generator belt.

s1.ptxt: Loosen tensioner by turning the tensioner (1) clockwise.
While holding the tensioner and belt loose.
Loosen tensioner bolt No.1 (2) and remove breather front No.1 hose clip (3).

attention2.ptxt: Do not apply any oil or grease to the accessory drive belt.

s1.ptxt: Loosen idler pulley bolt (7) and then remove idler pulley (5) and adapter (6).
Install adapter (6) and then tighten adapter.
Install idler pulley (5) and then tighten idler pulley bolt (7) to specified torque.
Tighten tensioner bolt No.1 (2) and install breather front No.1 hose clip (3).

torqueitem.t-part: Accessory drive belt and belt tensioner bolt No.1

s1.ptxt: Loosen tensioner by turning the tensioner (1) clockwise.
While holding the tensioner, install accessory drive belt (4).

attention3.ptxt: Make sure that the belt fits each pulley’s groove properly.
